tag_list: social-media-optimization, viral-content-promotion, search-engine-optimization, search-engine-marketing, email-marketing, affiliate-marketing, viral-video-marketing, viral-video-production
overview:
Nir Zahavi has years of experience in the fields of social media optimization, viral content promotion, search engine optimization, search engine marketing, email marketing, and affiliate marketing.

In the month of April 2010, Nir was the main online promoter of “Doritos Tablet” - the video that finished #1 out of 1,280 videos in the Doritos $100,000 “Name the New Flavour Contest” Canada.
